creatingWithCode: Creating with code, driven by passion.
aboutText: Hello, World! I'm Mario López, Frontend Developer learning backend to complement my skills and become a Full Stack developer, passionate about creating high-performance software solutions, centered on the user with intuitive and attractive designs.
aboutText2: With 1+ years of experience, I specialize in building high-quality web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern front-end technologies. Beyond work, I like to explore new technologies and turn ideas into reality through personal projects.
